original_text: ‘Tell these rules to the Israelites: A person might do a wrong thing against another person. If they do, then they have turned against the Lord.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 이르라 남자나 여자나 사람들이 범하는 죄를 범하여 여호와께 거역함으로 죄를 지으면

sentences.original_text: Tell these rules to the Israelites
A person might do a wrong thing
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람이 잘못된 일을 할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: then they have turned against the Lord
